achievements.name: Play Around
achievements.desc: Play a gamemode that isn't sandbox

achievements.name: Bridge Over Troubling Water
achievements.desc: Complete the first Hard Light Bridge test

achievements.name: Preservation of Mass
achievements.desc: Break the rules in Test Chamber 07

achievements.name: Drop Box
achievements.desc: Place a cube on a button without touching the cube

achievements.name: Undiscouraged
achievements.desc: Complete the first Thermal Discouragement Beam test

achievements.name: Worm Fodder
achievements.desc: Defeat the Eater of Worlds, a massive worm whom dwells in the corruption.

achievements.name: Infinity +1 Sword
achievements.desc: Obtain the Zenith, the culmination of a journey forged into the ultimate sword.

achievements.name: Baleful Harvest
achievements.desc: Reach the 15th wave of a pumpkin moon, where evil lurks among the autumn harvest.

achievements.name: Star Destroyer
achievements.desc: Defeat the four celestial towers of the moon.

achievements.name: Obsessive Devotion
achievements.desc: Defeat the Ancient Cultist, fanatical leader of the dungeon coven.

achievements.name: Fae Flayer
achievements.desc: Defeat the Empress of Light, responsible for all those flashy lights and glitter.

achievements.name: Fish Out of Water
achievements.desc: Defeat Duke Fishron, mutant terror of the sea.

achievements.name: Tin-Foil Hatter
achievements.desc: Triumph over a martian invasion, when beings from out of this world come to scramble your brains and probe you in uncomfortable places.

achievements.name: Lihzahrdian Idol
achievements.desc: Defeat Golem, the stone-faced ritualistic idol of the lihzahrd tribe.

achievements.name: Sword of the Hero
achievements.desc: Obtain a Terra Blade, forged from the finest blades of light and darkness.

achievements.name: Temple Raider
achievements.desc: Breach the impenetrable walls of the jungle temple.

achievements.name: Robbing the Grave
achievements.desc: Obtain a rare treasure from a difficult monster in the dungeon.

achievements.name: Big Booty
achievements.desc: Unlock one of the dungeon's large, mysterious chests with a special key.

achievements.name: The Great Southern Plantkill
achievements.desc: Defeat Plantera, the overgrown monstrosity of the jungle's depths.

achievements.name: Topped Off
achievements.desc: Attain maximum health and mana possible without accessories or buffs.

achievements.name: Just Desserts
achievements.desc: Defeat Queen Slime, giving the coup-de-grace to the sovereign of all that jiggles.

achievements.name: Fast and Fishious
achievements.desc: Complete your 50th quest for the angler.

achievements.name: Black Mirror
achievements.desc: Obtain the Cell Phone. You'll never leave home without it again.

achievements.name: Ankhumulation Complete
achievements.desc: Obtain the Ankh Shield, the finest protection from unpleasant maladies and ailments.

achievements.name: Kill the Sun
achievements.desc: Survive a solar eclipse, a day darker than night filled with creatures of horror.

achievements.name: Photosynthesis
achievements.desc: Mine chlorophyte, an organic ore found deep among the thickest of flora.

achievements.name: Drax Attax
achievements.desc: Craft a drax or pickaxe axe using hallowed bars, and the souls of the three mechanical bosses.

achievements.name: Get a Life
achievements.desc: Consume a life fruit, which grows in the thick of subterranean jungle grass.

achievements.name: Buckets of Bolts
achievements.desc: Defeat the three nocturnal mechanical menaces: the Twins, the Destroyer, and Skeletron Prime.

achievements.name: Boots of the Hero
achievements.desc: Obtain the Terraspark Boots, forged from the finest boots of fire and ice.

achievements.name: Trout Monkey
achievements.desc: Complete your 25th quest for the angler.

achievements.name: The Frequent Flyer
achievements.desc: Spend over 1 gold being treated by the nurse.

achievements.name: There are Some Who Call Him...
Leading Landlord
achievements.desc: Meet with a tenant who's as happy as they possibly can be!

achievements.name: It Can Talk?!
achievements.desc: Build a house in a mushroom biome and have the Truffle move in.

achievements.name: Walk the Plank
achievements.desc: Triumph over a pirate invasion, a group of pillagers from the sea out for your booty... and your life!

achievements.name: Extra Shiny!
achievements.desc: Mine a powerful ore that has been newly blessed upon your world.

achievements.name: Quiet Neighborhood
achievements.desc: Enter a misty graveyard filled with the surly dead.

achievements.name: Begone, Evil!
achievements.desc: Smash a demon or crimson altar with a powerful, holy hammer.

achievements.name: It's Hard!
achievements.desc: Unleash the ancient spirits of light and darkness across your world, enabling much stronger foes and showering the world with dazzling treasures (and rainbows!).

achievements.name: Still Hungry
achievements.desc: Defeat the Wall of Flesh, the master and core of the world who arises after a great, burning sacrifice.

achievements.name: Good Little Slave
achievements.desc: Complete your 10th quest for the angler.

achievements.name: Miner for Fire
achievements.desc: Craft a molten pickaxe using the hottest of materials.

achievements.name: Servant-in-Training
achievements.desc: Complete your 1st quest for the angler.

achievements.name: Jolly Jamboree
achievements.desc: What you're celebrating doesn't matter, just throw a party already!

achievements.name: A Shimmer In The Dark
achievements.desc: Shimmer an item into another item. What other transmutations can you find?

achievements.name: Dungeon Heist
achievements.desc: Steal a key from the dungeon's undead denizens, and unlock one of their precious golden chests.

achievements.name: Boned
achievements.desc: Defeat Skeletron, the cursed guardian of the dungeon.

achievements.name: Sting Operation
achievements.desc: Defeat the Queen Bee, the matriarch of the jungle hives.

achievements.name: Where's My Honey?
achievements.desc: Discover a large bee's hive deep in the jungle.

achievements.name: Jeepers Creepers
achievements.desc: Stumble into a spider cavern in the underground.

achievements.name: Sticky Situation
achievements.desc: Survive the slime rain, where gelatinous organisms fall from the sky in droves.

achievements.name: Slippery Shinobi
achievements.desc: Defeat King Slime, the lord of all things slimy.

achievements.name: Mastermind
achievements.desc: Defeat the Brain of Cthulhu, an enourmous demon brain which haunts the creeping crimson.

achievements.name: Into Orbit
achievements.desc: You can only go down from here!

achievements.name: It's Getting Hot in Here
achievements.desc: Spelunk deep enough to reach the molten underworld.

achievements.name: Funkytown
achievements.desc: Build or encounter a glowing mushroom field above the surface.

achievements.name: Goblin Punter
achievements.desc: Triumph over a goblin invasion, a ragtag regiment of crude, barbaric, pointy-eared warriors and their shadowflame sorcerers.

achievements.name: Dead Men Tell No Tales
achievements.desc: You were so preoccupied with whether or not you could open the chest that you didn't stop to think if you should.

achievements.name: Heliophobia
achievements.desc: Trick a gnome into turning into stone!

achievements.name: Smashing, Poppet!
achievements.desc: Using explosives or your trusty hammer, smash a Shadow Orb or Crimson Heart in the evil parts of your world.

achievements.name: Feeling Petty
achievements.desc: Deliver headpats to the town pet.

achievements.name: Bloodbath
achievements.desc: Survive a blood moon, a nocturnal event where the rivers run red and monsters swarm aplenty.

achievements.name: Vehicular Manslaughter
achievements.desc: Defeat an enemy by running it over with a minecart.

achievements.name: Watch Your Step!
achievements.desc: Become a victim to a nasty underground trap.

achievements.name: Marathon Medalist
achievements.desc: Travel a total of 26.2 miles on foot.

achievements.name: I Am Loot!
achievements.desc: Discover a golden chest underground and take a peek at its contents.

achievements.name: Fashion Statement
achievements.desc: Equip armor or vanity clothing in all three social slots.

achievements.name: Lucky Break
achievements.desc: Survive a long fall with just a sliver of health remaining.

achievements.name: Heart Breaker
achievements.desc: Discover and smash your first heart crystal underground.

achievements.name: Star Power
achievements.desc: Craft a mana crystal out of fallen stars, and consume it.

achievements.name: Eye on You
achievements.desc: Defeat the Eye of Cthulhu, an ocular menace who only appears at night.

achievements.name: Heavy Metal
achievements.desc: Obtain an anvil made from iron or lead.

achievements.name: No Hobo
achievements.desc: Build a house suitable enough for your first town NPC, such as the guide, to move into.

achievements.name: Stop! Hammer Time!
achievements.desc: Obtain your first hammer via crafting or otherwise.

achievements.name: Ooo! Shiny!
achievements.desc: Mine your first nugget of ore with a pickaxe.

achievements.name: You Can Do It!
achievements.desc: Survive your character's first full night.

achievements.name: Matching Attire
achievements.desc: Equip armor in all three armor slots: head, chest, and feet.

achievements.name: Counter Intelligence
achievements.desc: Solve a Cipher in under 5 seconds.

achievements.name: Perfect Game
achievements.desc: Release a game with a clean score of 10.

achievements.name: Versatile
achievements.desc: Release a successful game in each of the five main genres.

achievements.name: 1M Engine
achievements.desc: Invest over one million in a new game engine.

achievements.name: Platinum
achievements.desc: Sell one million copies of a game without the help of a publisher.

achievements.name: 500K Engine
achievements.desc: Invest over 500K in a new game engine.

achievements.name: Gold
achievements.desc: Sell half a million copies of a game without the help of a publisher.

achievements.name: Cult Status
achievements.desc: Set a new standard for the early gaming industry.

achievements.name: Inception
achievements.desc: Develop the game within the game.

achievements.name: 100K Engine
achievements.desc: Invest over 100K in a new game engine.

achievements.name: Good Judgement
achievements.desc: Create a game with a good topic/genre combination.

achievements.name: Supporter
achievements.desc: Support a young start-up. Buy the game.

achievements.name: The End Plague
achievements.desc: Win one game with any disease type and any difficulty

achievements.name: Bottle Smasher
achievements.desc: Smash a Blue cure bubble and slow down the Research Team

achievements.name: RMS Watch List
achievements.desc: Get your Plague on the RMS Watch List

achievements.name: Published Scenario
achievements.desc: Publish a Plague Inc:Evolved Scenario to Steam Workshop

achievements.name: Cast Member
achievements.desc: Complete the story's opening sequence in any mode.

achievements.name: I Knew Someone Would Do It
Guiding Light
achievements.desc: Rate the difficulty of 1000 online levels

achievements.name: Give me a CHALLENGE!
achievements.desc: Complete 40 Demon difficulty levels in Normal mode

achievements.name: Demolicious!
achievements.desc: Complete 30 Demon difficulty levels in Normal mode

achievements.name: Unstoppable!
achievements.desc: Complete 20 Demon difficulty levels in Normal mode

achievements.name: Tonight, we dine in GEOMETRY DASH!
achievements.desc: Complete 1000 user created levels in Normal mode

achievements.name: Master of Timing
achievements.desc: Complete 15 Demon difficulty levels in Normal mode

achievements.name: Geometry Creator
achievements.desc: Get 100 likes on a created level

achievements.name: Theory of Everything 2!
achievements.desc: Complete "Theory of Everything 2" in Normal mode

achievements.name: Demonic Overmind
achievements.desc: Complete 10 Demon difficulty levels in Normal mode

achievements.name: SteamStep!
achievements.desc: Complete "Clubstep" in Normal mode (Steam Exclusive Bonus)

achievements.name: Where is it?! Where is it?!
Demonic Guardian
achievements.desc: Complete 5 Demon difficulty levels in Normal mode

achievements.name: Second Theory
achievements.desc: Complete "Theory of Everything 2" in Practice mode

achievements.name: Bring me their heads!
achievements.desc: Complete 500 user created levels in Normal mode

achievements.name: Demon Master
achievements.desc: Complete 4 Demon difficulty levels in Normal mode

achievements.name: The One
achievements.desc: Complete 3 Demon difficulty levels in Normal mode

achievements.name: No match for me!
achievements.desc: Complete 300 user created levels in Normal mode

achievements.name: Visionary
achievements.desc: Rate the difficulty of 100 online levels

achievements.name: Spike dodger
achievements.desc: Complete 200 user created levels in Normal mode

achievements.name: Demon Chaser
achievements.desc: Complete 2 Demon difficulty levels in Normal mode

achievements.name: GeometryTube
achievements.desc: Subscribe to RobTop Games on YouTube

achievements.name: Geometrician
achievements.desc: Complete 100 user created levels in Normal mode

achievements.name: Theory of Everything!
achievements.desc: Complete "Theory of Everything" in Normal mode

achievements.name: Theory of Something
achievements.desc: Complete "Theory of Everything" in Practice mode

achievements.name: Creator
achievements.desc: Create and submit a custom level

achievements.name: The Gamer
achievements.desc: Complete 50 user created levels in Normal mode

achievements.name: So close
achievements.desc: Crash at over 95% on a main level in normal mode

achievements.name: Cant Let Go!
achievements.desc: Complete "Cant Let Go" in Normal mode

achievements.name: All your base...
achievements.desc: Complete "Base After Base" in Practice mode

achievements.name: Hold on
achievements.desc: Complete "Cant Let Go" in Practice mode

achievements.name: Base After Base!
achievements.desc: Complete "Base After Base" in Normal mode

achievements.name: Supporter
achievements.desc: Review "Geometry Dash" and let us know what you think

achievements.name: Master
achievements.desc: Complete 10 user created levels in Normal mode

achievements.name: Reflex Champion
achievements.desc: Complete a Demon difficulty level in Normal mode

achievements.name: Guide
achievements.desc: Rate the difficulty of an online level

achievements.name: Steamrolling!
achievements.desc: Complete level 1-3 in Normal mode (Steam Exclusive)

achievements.name: On my way
achievements.desc: Complete "Back On Track" in Practice mode

achievements.name: Back On Track!
achievements.desc: Complete "Back On Track" in Normal mode

achievements.name: RobTop Gamer
achievements.desc: Click on the More Games button!

achievements.name: Challenger
achievements.desc: Complete a user created level in Normal mode

achievements.name: That Achievement's Name...
achievements.desc: Reach the “Special Relativity” Moon unlock (100 everything) - …Was Albert Einstein.

achievements.name: Here We Go Again!
achievements.desc: Purchase the first angel upgrade on the Moon, “It Begins Again” - Great renewable resource, or GREATEST?

achievements.name: Earth Overlord!
achievements.desc: Purchase the "Buy Earth" Upgrade on Earth

achievements.name: Ominous...
achievements.desc: Buy 666 or more of each Earth investment - A lot of unlucky numbers.

achievements.name: 1 Small Step...
achievements.desc: Get 1 of every Moon investment - 1 giant leap for management!

achievements.name: Gallery Tour
achievements.desc: Click the Gallery button on the Moon (in the Unlock Menu) - Did you know that was a button?

achievements.name: Divine Intervention
achievements.desc: Reset for your first Moon Angel - Help is on the way!

achievements.name: Release The Hounds
achievements.desc: Deploy your Profit Martians for the First Time

achievements.name: Bloody Millionaire
achievements.desc: Accumulate a total of 1 million blood points. (blood points can be spent before reaching the total)

achievements.name: I
achievements.desc: Reach prestige Level I with any character.

achievements.name: Sorted
achievements.desc: In a public match, spend most of the trial injured (more than 50%) and live to tell the story.

achievements.name: Cottage Owner
achievements.desc: In a public match, repair the generator in the Mother's Dwelling and live to tell the story.

achievements.name: Agonizing Escape
achievements.desc: In a public match, crawl your way out.

achievements.name: Humanitarian
achievements.desc: Affect other Survivors with positive status effects 50 times in public matches.

achievements.name: Perfect Escape
achievements.desc: In a public match, as a survivor, complete with at least 5000 blood points in each score category.

achievements.name: Adept Dwight
achievements.desc: In a public match, escape with Dwight using only his 3 unique perks.

achievements.name: No one left behind
achievements.desc: In a public match, rescue someone after at least one gate has opened.

achievements.name: Adept Huntress
achievements.desc: In a public match, achieve a merciless victory with The Huntress using only her 3 unique perks.

achievements.name: The Grand Sacrifice
achievements.desc: In a public match, get 4 sacrifices in a single match.

achievements.name: Preemptive Strike
achievements.desc: Hook a Survivor in a public match before any generators have been fully repaired.

achievements.name: Getting the hang of it
achievements.desc: Raise your grade for the first time.

achievements.name: Zealous
achievements.desc: In a public match, get more than 8K blood points in one scoring category.

achievements.name: The Eagle has Landers
achievements.desc: In Ascension, escape on all three lunar landers.

achievements.name: Blue Ribbon
achievements.desc: Get 1st place in the Stardew Valley Fair competition.

achievements.name: Cliques
achievements.desc: Reach a 5-heart friend level with 4 people.

achievements.name: Best Friends
achievements.desc: Reach a 10-heart friend level with someone.

achievements.name: Treasure Trove
achievements.desc: Donate 40 different items to the museum.

achievements.name: The Bottom
achievements.desc: Reach the lowest level of the mines.

achievements.name: A New Friend
achievements.desc: Reach a 5-heart friend level with someone.

achievements.name: Pest
achievements.desc: Cause 1 fatal error or trigger 128 warnings in the editor.

achievements.name: Trying something new
achievements.desc: Use 10 different wallpapers from the Workshop.

achievements.name: Lenny Box (SnyderYT)
achievements.desc: You unlocked Secret Lenny Box character "SnyderYT"!

achievements.desc: You unlocked Secret Lenny Box character "ToshDeluxe"!

achievements.name: Pink Sunrise
achievements.desc: Collect the Crystal Heart in Chapter 7

achievements.name: Quiet and Falling
achievements.desc: Collect the Crystal Heart in Chapter 5

achievements.name: Heavy and Frail
achievements.desc: Collect the Crystal Heart in Chapter 6

achievements.name: Eye of the Storm
achievements.desc: Collect the Crystal Heart in Chapter 4

achievements.name: Scattered and Lost
achievements.desc: Collect the Crystal Heart in Chapter 3

achievements.name: Heart of the Mountain
achievements.desc: Collect the Crystal Heart in Chapter 8

achievements.name: Resurrections
achievements.desc: Collect the Crystal Heart in Chapter 2

achievements.name: Pointless Machines
achievements.desc: Collect the Crystal Heart in Chapter 1

achievements.name: Snakes, it had to be snakes
Rocketality
achievements.desc: Kill dummy with a rocket launcher

achievements.name: A Thousand Coins
achievements.desc: Gain 1.000 Coins in a single game.

achievements.name: Bracketeering: Cinderella Story
achievements.desc: Win a bracket with an answer that everyone predicted would lose each round

achievements.name: Monster Seeking Monster: Consolation Prize
achievements.desc: Nobody gets a date during one of the nights

achievements.name: Survive the Internet: Shadow Star
achievements.desc: Win a game without getting a Best Burn

achievements.name: Civic Doodle: Civic Doodie
achievements.desc: Draw something that gets 100 poop emojis

achievements.name: Civic Doodle: Popular Vote
achievements.desc: Get all player votes and 90% of audience votes in a single matchup (5+ player game)

achievements.name: Bracketeering: Split Decision
achievements.desc: Have a match up go to overtime with an audience playing along

achievements.name: Civic Doodle: Reelection
achievements.desc: Get both of your additions accepted in a single round (non final round)

achievements.name: Survive the Internet: Stick Pic
achievements.desc: Select the image of the animal that lives the "life of a twig eater"

achievements.name: Survive the Internet: Second-Degree Burn
achievements.desc: Get the Best Burn twice in one game

achievements.name: Day & Night
achievements.desc: Get total played time 24 hours or more.

achievements.name: 100 Million
achievements.desc: Get total score 100 million or more.

achievements.name: Precision
achievements.desc: Get rank S on at least 15 different levels on hard difficulty (solo free play only).

achievements.name: Memory
achievements.desc: Clear any level with disappearing arrows modifier.

achievements.name: On the Edge
achievements.desc: Clear any level with One Life modifier.

achievements.name: Hope
achievements.desc: Get rank S on at least 15 different levels on expert difficulty (solo free play only).

achievements.name: Traveller
achievements.desc: Get 100 kilometers travelled hand distance or more.

achievements.name: Expert
achievements.desc: Clear any level on expert difficulty without any modifiers.

achievements.name: Drill
achievements.desc: Get total 10 000 good cuts or more.

achievements.name: Special
achievements.desc: Get at least rank S on any level on hard difficulty without any modifiers.

achievements.name: Concentrate
achievements.desc: Clear any level on hard difficulty and get at least 100 combo without any modifiers.

achievements.name: Pay Attention
achievements.desc: Clear any level on normal difficulty and get at least 50 combo without any modifiers.

achievements.name: Good Enough
achievements.desc: Get at least rank A on any level on normal difficulty without any modifiers.

achievements.name: Pure
achievements.desc: Clear any level without any modifiers.

achievements.name: Blockade Breaker
achievements.desc: Kill 15 boss monsters in a single run.

achievements.name: ...Maybe One More.
achievements.desc: Duplicate the same item 7 times in a row with a 3D Printer.

achievements.name: Guidance Offline
achievements.desc: Defeat the unique guardian of Siren's Call.

achievements.name: Commando: Godspeed
achievements.desc: As Commando, fully charge the first-stage teleporter before the timer hits 5 minutes.

achievements.name: Never Back Down
achievements.desc: In 4 consecutive stages don’t leave the teleporter radius until it is fully charged.

achievements.name: Keyed Up
achievements.desc: Defeat the Teleporter boss under 15 seconds.

achievements.name: Verified
achievements.desc: Complete the first Teleporter event 5 times.

achievements.name: Experimenting
achievements.desc: Pick up 5 different types of Equipment.

achievements.name: Warrior
achievements.desc: Reach and complete the 3rd Teleporter event without dying.

achievements.name: "Is This Bugged?"
achievements.desc: Fail the Shrine of Chance 3 times in a row.

achievements.name: It's Better Without The Salt.
achievements.desc: Craft and place a simple purifier.

achievements.name: Infinity Scroll
achievements.desc: Unlock the Infinity Scroll in the Player Skill Tree

achievements.name: Mega Picker
achievements.desc: Get a total of 100 million picks

achievements.name: Condemned
achievements.desc: Unlock and visit the Nether biome

achievements.name: Lapis!
achievements.desc: Collect a total of 100 Lapis Lazuli

achievements.name: Caved In
achievements.desc: Unlock and visit the Caves biome

achievements.name: Snowed In
achievements.desc: Unlock and visit the Tundra biome

achievements.name: Super Picker
achievements.desc: Get a total of 10 million picks

achievements.name: Expert Picker
achievements.desc: Get a total of 1 million picks

achievements.name: Stranded
achievements.desc: Unlock and visit the Desert biome

achievements.name: Heating Up!
achievements.desc: Use your Pickaxe Power for the first time

achievements.name: Winner
achievements.desc: Win the jackpot at a slot machine

achievements.name: Swordmaster
achievements.desc: Kill 3 enemies or more with a single sword slash

achievements.name: Jester
achievements.desc: Fail miserably at a trivia minigame

achievements.name: Royal
achievements.desc: Gather royal steel or royal clothing

achievements.name: Sharpshooter
achievements.desc: Kill an enemy with a single arrow shot

achievements.name: Gemologist
achievements.desc: Have one of each gem in your inventory

achievements.name: IMPOSSIBLE TASK
achievements.desc: Complete the card swipe task on your first try

achievements.name: CREWPOSTOR
achievements.desc: Fix a sabotage that you called

achievements.name: SMOOTH TALKER
achievements.desc: Win a game by vote as Impostor

achievements.name: NEVER SUSPECT A THING
achievements.desc: Win a 2 Impostor game with both Impostors alive at the end of the game.

achievements.name: LIGHTS OUT
achievements.desc: Get a kill during a lights sabotage

achievements.name: SHERLOCK
achievements.desc: Win a game as crew with your only votes being for the Impostor

achievements.name: SURVIVOR
achievements.desc: Survive and win a game as a crewmate

achievements.name: SLASHER
achievements.desc: Win a game by killing all crewmates as Impostor.

achievements.name: There's really no hard limit to how long these achievement names can be and to be quite honest I'm rather curious to see how far we can go. Adolphus W. Green (1844–1917) started as the Principal of the Groton School in 1864. By 1865, he became second assistant librarian at the New York Mercantile Library; from 1867 to 1869, he was promoted to full librarian. From 1869 to 1873, he worked for Evarts, Southmayd & Choate, a law firm co-founded by William M. Evarts, Charles Ferdinand Southmayd and Joseph Hodges Choate. He was admitted to the New York State Bar Association in 1873. Anyway, how's your day been?
